message.body: just checking--were you planning for me to work tomorrow or not?
Hey Lauren. Sorry about the delay in getting back to you. I'm not going to be home tomorrow and I'll be out of town Wednesday Thursday and Friday.
okay, no problem! did you want me to come in and pack boxes?
Now that being said...you are more than welcome to work Thursday or Friday on your own if you'd like to pack boxes or take pictures
yup, i can totally do that!
K... I'll leave stuff in the green room for pictures and I'll leave my ebay info for you to pack boxes.
and a key under the mat, i assume, like last year?
